title: Skin buffs
body:
So, i was thinking why would people buy skins, just because they change the looks of the champ i mean why would i waste $50 on a legendary/ultimate skin just to change how they look. Riot if you are reading this can you plz give skins a buff either buff their skill, or if possible change it.
thx for reading {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Mr Mundoverse is already pretty buff.
Well skin buffs already exist if u play any skin that has sunglasses u take 1 less damage from sunlight from Leona

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=OtFxn2Po,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-07T08:14:18.418+0000)
>
> What.

All i am trying to say is give skins buffs.

> [{quoted}](name=Hiitsjustme,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=OtFxn2Po,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-07T08:30:05.739+0000)
>
> All i am trying to say is give skins buffs.

No.

Some skins already do have "buffs", though adding a actual buffs is wrong as those that cannot afford skins will be left under powered in a game where everyone should have the same opportunities.


[Jeremy "Gaming Curios" ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCB4GZzsP0IJKWX8-IhEOnDQ) does a couple of videos (admittingly they're were from last year, but they hold up) on skins that have hidden buffs.

You can see [part 1 here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8a8f-x89QPI) and [part 2 here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pc-Wd3jIM7k)

Hope this helps :)

Who wants to play yet another a game where the richest people always win?
Thats what real life is for!
